channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Hole in floor around lampost, 26th August
item.description:
A large hole bigger than a adult foot is surrounding a leaning over lamppost. I have caught my foot in the hole and it nearly snapped my ankle. This is a high risk hazard. The hole needs to be filled and the lamp post straightened as it will lean over more until the hole is filed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Curlew Close, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep pothole in southbound lane opposite entrance to 22 Southwark Bridge Road, 26th August
item.description:
This pothole has been here for two months, viewable on Street View here: https://www.google.com/maps/@51.5066846,-0.0951695,3a,15y,24.31h,81.19t/data=!3m7!1e1!3m5!1sgmeb7yJ3XIu3OMp9izFRig!2e0!6shttps:%2F%2Fstreetviewpixels-pa.googleapis.com%2Fv1%2Fthumbnail%3Fcb_client%3Dmaps_sv.tactile%26w%3D900%26h%3D600%26pitch%3D8.811164942498507%26panoid%3Dgmeb7yJ3XIu3OMp9izFRig%26yaw%3D24.314520161819683!7i16384!8i8192?entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI1MDgyNC4wIKXMDSoASAFQAw%3D%3D

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3-13, Southwark Bridge Road, The Borough, London

item.title: Graffiti on speed bumps, 26th August
item.description:
Graffiti on speed bumps at Danson Park. You say you’re “monitoring the situation” but what does that mean? It’s still graffiti in a public space and needs to be removed. It makes the park look trashy.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Danson Park, Blendon, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Debris from alleyway, 26th August
item.description:
The alleyway between no 40 and 42 constantly deposits gravel and other debris especially when there is rain. This is now covering the footpath and can be hazardous under foot. A simple drainage channel being added between the pavement and alleyway could massively prevent this from happening
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 42, Ridgeway West, Falconwood, London
Report on FixMyStreet
